title: Audio Errand Planner
description: Practice auditory attention and sequencing by recalling errands in the correct order.

title: Cash Point Coach
description: Cash Point Coach — Practise ATM skills: insert card, enter PIN, withdraw, check balance, top-up, change PIN.

title: AR Neglect Scanner Prototype
description: Marker-based AR session to assess left/right search coverage with CSV export.

title: Barista Chaos
description: Prioritise and serve orders amid interruptions and changing rules.

title: Emergency Despatch
description: Route selection and rapid decision-making with time pressure.

title: Emotion Chat
description: Recognise emotions and intentions in short chat-style vignettes.

title: Email Composer Coach
description: Draft everyday emails and receive structured coaching on clarity and tone.

title: Errands — Visual Memory
description: Remember locations/objects while completing errands.

title: Market Manager
description: Scan items, process payments, handle interruptions.

title: Maze Explorer
description: Spatial planning and working memory in grid-based mazes.

title: Brightwave Mobile Banking Simulator
description: Practise real-time mobile banking: balances, transfers, bills, card controls, and statement exports.

title: Memory in Action
description: Short-term recall inside simple task sequences.

title: Office Day
description: Everyday multi-tasking across common office-style tasks.

title: Plan with Coco
description: Break goals into steps; schedule and reorder flexibly.

title: Shopping Trip Problem Solver
description: Plan transport, budget, and in-store decisions for a grocery outing.

title: Signal Master
description: Rapid signal detection and rule switching.

title: Star Hunt
description: Visual search with distractors; speed–accuracy balancing.

title: Taskflow
description: Manage cooking, texts, and shopping under time pressure.

title: Task Juggler
description: Build and follow procedural flows with checkpoints.

title: Emergency Call Simulator
description: Practice dialling 999 and requesting an ambulance during a mock emergency call.

title: Tower Control
description: Stacking/ordering puzzle emphasising planning ahead.

title: Travel with Coco
description: Plan simple trips; juggle constraints and choices.

title: Fluency Coach
description: Strategy-led verbal fluency with voice capture and grouping support.

title: Left-Anchor Reader
description: Practice reading while using visual anchors.

title: Word Scavenger
description: Find words under constraints; phonemic/semantic fluency.
